SEARCH
Package Utils.MockObjects

Class MockFactory

java.lang.Object
Utils.MockObjects.MockFactory
public class MockFactory extends Object
It is used to create mock objects of the model, the board, the players and the common goals. It has a static method for each object to be mocked.

    • getMock

      public static MockModel getMock(GameModel model)
      It creates a mock object of the model. It uses the other methods of this class to mock the board, the players and the common goals.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to be mocked
      Returns:
      the mock model object
